events.comment: Idea for later: If hovering over will give a string that is used throught stuff like Global vars and names, then maybe we can reduce the code?
For each object, at the beginning of frame, set each "Background" object to a different frame and speed
Once the animation is over, change the speed scale again
When hovering over icon, set the UP X + Y position
When The Animatronic's AI is under 10, add a space (to avoid weird glitch)
When The Animatronic's AI is over 10, don't add a space (to avoid weird glitch)
When AI is 0, make the icon transparent
When AI is not 0, make the icon non-transparent
The the cursor is on UP & The left button is pressed & it's over the animatronic, and it isn't over 20, start the 'hold timer' and change the AI by 1
When cursor is released, pause the Timer
When the UP button is being hold and the 'HOLD' timer is over one, constantly add 1, and pause the timer when button released
/\/\/\ Same thing as above execpt with the DOWN key /\/\/\
When hovering over icon, set the UP X + Y position
